stimulusHtml: Which of the following implementations of  doSomething will allow this code segment to run without error when added to the  Widget  class?

features.html:
Consider the following class definition.

 

public class Widget 
{
   private int number; 
   private static String word = "start";
      
   public Widget() 
   { /* implementation not shown */ }
}

 

The following code segment appears in a class other than  Widget. 

 

int result = Widget.doSomething();

choicesHtml:
public static int doSomething() 
{
   return number; 
}

public static int doSomething() 
{
   return word.length(); 
}
